channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-2718] BlobClob4BlobTest and LobStreamTest fail creating database due to NullPointerException on weme 6.1
item.description:
NullPointerException getting security provider on J2ME (WEME 6.1)

item.summary: BlobClob4BlobTest and LobStreamTest fail creating database due to NullPointerException on weme 6.1

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: can it be because I have enabled BlobClob4BlobTest and LobStreamsTest to run with with encryption support and J2ME (WEME 6.1) doesn't have Security Provider ?

Sounds likely. EncryptionSuite has this comment:

// Encryption only supported for Derby in J2SE/J2EE environments.
// J2ME (JSR169) does not support encryption.
